74 int main()

78  int rc = 0;
79  string result, ref;
80  string a = "1234567890", b = "456";
81  string aa = "---1234567890---";
82  char c = '-';
83  string d = "--";
84  string hexDumpString(hexDumpMess, sizeof(hexDumpMess));
85 
86  // Someone may want to do this to a string stream and do some
87  // comparisons and what-not... for now, I'm only testing to
88  // make sure it doesn't crash...
89  cout << "Standard hex dump:" << endl;
90  hexDumpData(cout, hexDumpString);
91  cout << endl << "Alternate hex dump:" << endl;
92  HexDumpDataConfig hdcfg(true, true, true, 8, 2, 2, 1, 0, 0, 16, true,
93  '\'', 1);
94  hexDumpData(cout, hexDumpString, 6, hdcfg);
95 
96  cout << endl << "Above using printable():" << endl;
97  cout << printable(hexDumpString) << endl;

100  //#############################
101  // Justification tests
102 
103  cout << "Original: " << a << endl;
104  ref = a;
105  result = string(3,c) + a;
106  a = rightJustify(a, a.length() + 3, c);
107  if(a != result)
108  {
109  cout << "rightJustify failed: " << a << endl
110  << "Should be: " << result << endl;
111  }
112 
113  a = ref;
114  result = a + string(3,c);
115  a = leftJustify(a, a.length()+3, c);
116  if(a != result)
117  {
118  cout << "leftJustify failed: " << a << endl
119  << "Should be: " << result << endl;
120  }
121 
122  a = ref;
123  result = string(3,c) + a + string(3,c);
124  a = center(a, a.length()+6, c);
125  if(a != result)
126  {
127  cout << "center failed: " << a << endl
128  << "Should be: " << result << endl;
129  }
130 
131  a = ref;
132

134  // Strip Tests
135 
136  //######## Leading
137  ref = aa;
138  result = aa.substr(1,string::npos);
139  aa = stripLeading(aa, c, 1);
140  if(aa != result)
141  {
142  cout << "stripLeading(string, char, 1) failed: " << aa << endl
143  << "Should be: " << result << endl;
144  }
145 
146  aa = ref;
147  result = aa.substr(2,string::npos);
148  aa = stripLeading(aa, d, 1);
149  if(aa != result)
150  {
151  cout << "stripLeading(string, char *, 1) failed: " << aa << endl
152  << "Should be: " << result << endl;
153  }
154 
155  aa = ref;
156  result = aa.substr(3,string::npos);
157  aa = stripLeading(aa, c);
158  if(aa != result)
159  {
160  cout << "stripLeading(string, char) failed: " << aa << endl
161  << "Should be: " << result << endl;
162  }
163 
164  aa = ref;
165  result = aa.substr(2,string::npos);
166  aa = stripLeading(aa, d);
167  if(aa != result)
168  {
169  cout << "stripLeading(string, char *) failed: " << aa << endl
170  << "Should be: " << result << endl;
171  }
172 
173  //######## Trailing
174  aa = ref;
175  result = aa.substr(0, aa.length()-1);
176  aa = stripTrailing(aa, c, 1);
177  if(aa != result)
178  {
179  cout << "stripTrailing(string, char, 1) failed: " << aa << endl
180  << "Should be: " << result << endl;
181  }
182 
183  aa = ref;
184  result = aa.substr(0, aa.length()-2);
185  aa = stripTrailing(aa, d, 1);
186  if(aa != result)
187  {
188  cout << "stripTrailing(string, char *, 1) failed: " << aa << endl
189  << "Should be: " << result << endl;
190  }
191 
192  aa = ref;
193  result = aa.substr(0, aa.length()-3);
194  aa = stripTrailing(aa, c);
195  if(aa != result)
196  {
197  cout << "stripTrailing(string, char) failed: " << aa << endl
198  << "Should be: " << result << endl;
199  }
200 
201  aa = ref;
202  result = aa.substr(0, aa.length()-2);
203  aa = stripTrailing(aa, d);
204  if(aa != result)
205  {
206  cout << "stripTrailing(string, char *) failed: " << aa << endl
207  << "Should be: " << result << endl;
208  }
209 
210  //######## Both Leading & Trailing
211  aa = ref;
212  result = aa.substr(1,aa.length()-2);
213  aa = strip(aa, c, 1);
214  if(aa != result)
215  {
216  cout << "strip(string, char, 1) failed: " << aa << endl
217  << "Should be: " << result << endl;
218  }
219 
220  aa = ref;
221  result = aa.substr(2,aa.length()-4);
222  aa = strip(aa, d, 1);
223  if(aa != result)
224  {
225  cout << "strip(string, char *, 1) failed: " << aa << endl
226  << "Should be: " << result << endl;
227  }
228 
229  aa = ref;
230  result = aa.substr(3, aa.length()-6);
231  aa = strip(aa,c);
232  if(aa != result)
233  {
234  cout << "strip(string, char) failed: " << aa << endl
235  << "Should be: " << result << endl;
236  }
237

239  result = aa.substr(2, aa.length()-4);
240  aa = strip(aa,d);
241  if(aa != result)
242  {
243  cout << "strip(string, char *) failed: " << aa << endl
244  << "Should be: " << result << endl;
245  }

247  //################################
248  //translation
249  string xlat = "The Hoopy Ford Prefect Boffs the Eccentrica Gallumbits";
250  string xlati1 = "sdfgDFG";
251  string xlato1 = "!)#%#)%";
252  string xlata1 = "The Hoopy )or) Pre#ect Bo##! the Eccentrica %allumbit!";
253  string xlati2 = "sdfgDFG";
254  string xlato2 = "!)#%";
255  string xlata2 = "The Hoopy or) Pre#ect Bo##! the Eccentrica allumbit!";
256  string xlati3 = "sdfgDFG";
257  string xlato3 = "sdfgDFG";
258  string xlata3 = "The Hoopy Ford Prefect Boffs the Eccentrica Gallumbits";
259  aa = translate(xlat, xlati1, xlato1);
260  if (aa != xlata1)
261  {
262  cout << "translate(const string&,const string&,const string&,char) "
263  << "failed: " << aa << endl
264  << "should be " << xlata1 << endl;
265  }
266  aa = translate(xlat, xlati2, xlato2);
267  if (aa != xlata2)
268  {
269  cout << "translate(const string&,const string&,const string&,char) "
270  << "failed: " << aa << endl
271  << "should be " << xlata2 << endl;
272  }
273  aa = translate(xlat, xlati3, xlato3);
274  if (aa != xlata3)
275  {
276  cout << "translate(const string&,const string&,const string&,char) "
277  << "failed: " << aa << endl
278  << "should be " << xlata3 << endl;
279  }
280 
281  //################################
282  //String to number
283  int res = asInt(a);
284  if (1234567890 != res)
285  {
286  cout << "asInt(string&) failed: " << res << endl
287  << "should be 1234567890" << endl;
288  }
289 
290  a = "12345.67890";
291  double res2 = asDouble(a);
292  if ( (double)(12345.67890) != res2)
293  {
294  cout << "asDouble(string&) failed: " << setprecision(15) << res2 << endl
295  << "should be 12345.67890 " << endl;
296  }
297 
298  float res25 = asFloat(a);
299  if( (float)(12345.67890) != res25)
300  {
301  cout << "asFloat(string&) failed: " << setprecision(15) << res25 << endl
302  << "should be 12345.67890 " << endl;
303  }
304 
305  long double lda = 12345.67890L;
306  long double res3 = asLongDouble(a);
307  if (lda != res3)
308  {
309  cout << "asLongDouble(string&) failed: " << setprecision(21) << res3
310  << endl << "should be 12345.67890 " << endl;
311  }
312 
313  //#####################################33
314  // Number as string
315 
316  res2 = 12345.6789; // double
317  res3 = 12345.6789L; // long double
318  res = 1234567890; // int
319 
320  aa = asString(res2);
321  if(asDouble(aa) != res2)
322  {
323  cout << "asString(double) failed: " << aa << endl
324  << "should be 12345.6789" << endl;
325  }
326 
327  aa = asString(res3);
328  if(asLongDouble(aa) != res3)
329  {
330  cout << "asString(long double) failed: " << aa << endl
331  << "should be 12345.6789" << endl;
332  }
333 
334  aa = asString(res);
335  if(asInt(aa) != res)
336  {
337  cout << "asString(X) failed: " << aa << endl
338  << "should be " << res << endl;
339  }
340 
341  // ##############################3
342  // Hex tests
343 
344  string q="0x100 bleh";
345  string z="100 moo";
346 
347  result = x2d(q);
348  if (result != string("256 bleh"))
349  {
350  cout << "x2d failed: " << result << endl
351  << "Should be: '256 bleh'"<< endl;
352  }
353 
354  result = d2x(z);
355  if (result != string("64 moo"))
356  {
357  cout << "x2d failed: " << result << endl
358  << "Should be: '64 moo'"<< endl;
359  }
360 
361  //##############################3
362  // String replacement
363 
364  a = "010101000111010";
365  aa = "0-0-0-000---0-0";
366  string aaa = "0abc0abc0abc000abcabcabc0abc0";
367 
368  ref = a;
369  a = replaceAll(a, string("1"), string("-"));
370  if(a != aa)
371  {
372  cout << "replaceAll() failed: " << a << endl
373  << "should be " << aa << endl;
374  }
375 
376  a = ref;
377  a = replaceAll(a, string("1"), string("abc"));
378  if(a != aaa)
379  {
380  cout << "replaceAll() failed: " << a << endl
381  << "should be " << aaa << endl;
382  }
383 
384  a = ref;
385  aaa = "01230123012300012312312301230";
386  a = replaceAll(a, string("1"), string("123"));
387  if(a != aaa)
388  {
389  cout << "replaceAll() failed: " << a << endl
390  << "should be " << aaa << endl;
391  }
392 
393  //##############################################
394  // Word Tests
395  a = " The Quick Brown Fox Jumps Over The Lazy Dog. ";
396 
397  aa = firstWord(a);
398  if(aa != string("The"))
399  {
400  cout << "firstWord() failed: " << aa << endl
401  << "should be 'The'" << endl;
402  }
403 
404  res = numWords(a);
405  if(res != 9)
406  {
407  cout << "numWords() failed: " << res << endl
408  << "should be 9" << endl;
409  }
410 
411  aa = word(a, 4);
412  if(aa != string("Jumps"))
413  {
414  cout << "word() failed: " << aa << endl
415  << "should be 'Jumps'" << endl;
416  }
417 
418  removeWords(a, 3, 2);
419  result = " The Quick Brown Over The Lazy Dog. ";
420  if(a != result)
421  {
422  cout << "removeWords() failed: " << a << endl
423  << "should be '" << result << "'" << endl;
424  }
425 
426  aa = stripFirstWord(a);
427  result = "Quick Brown Over The Lazy Dog. ";
428  if ((aa != string("The")) ||
429  (a != result))
430  {
431  cout << "stripFirstWord() failed: " << aa << endl
432  << "should be 'The'" << endl
433  << "and: " << a << endl
434  << "should be '" << result << "'" << endl;
435  }
436 
437  removeWords(a, 5);
438  result = "Quick Brown Over The Lazy";
439  if (a != result)
440  {
441  cout << "removeWords failed: " << a << endl
442  << "should be '" << result << "'" << endl;
443  }
444 
445  aa = words(a, 3);
446  result = "The Lazy";
447  if (aa != result)
448  {
449  cout << "words failed: \'" << aa << "' (" << a << ")" << endl
450  << "should be '" << result << "'" << endl;
451  }
452 
453  //####################
454  // regular expressions
455 
456  rc = isLike(a, "Br.*Over.*");
457  if (rc != 1)
458  {
459  cout << "isLike (Br.*Over.*) failed: " << rc << endl
460  << "should be: 1" << endl;
461  }
462 
463  rc = isLike(a, "Br.Over.*");
464  if (rc != 0)
465  {
466  cout << "isLike (Br.Over.*) failed: " << rc << endl
467  << "should be: 0" << endl;
468  }
469 
470  aa = matches(a, "Br.*Over.*");
471  result = "Brown Over The Lazy";
472  if (aa != result)
473  {
474  cout << "matches failed: " << aa << endl
475  << "should be: '" << result << "'" << endl;
476  }
477 
478  string prettyPrintThis("This is a very long sentence that will get cut up into lines with a maximum length of 40 characters, each line indented by a few spaces.");
479  prettyPrint(prettyPrintThis, "\n", " ", " ", 40);
480  cout << prettyPrintThis << endl;
481 
482  cout << "All other Tests Passed." << endl;
483 
484  return 0;
485  }
486  catch (gpstk::Exception& e)
487  {
488  cout << e << endl;
489  }
490 }
